abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Renewable Energy
            Project for Turkey is to increase privately owned and
            operated distributed power generation from renewable sources
            in the Turkish electricity market. The environmental impact
            assessment details the procedures that will be undertaken to
            ascertain environmental impacts and mitigations.
